name: The Harbinger's Wanyugo Mask
data: It increases the users wisdom magnificently.
It decreases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
